title: Deploy GoCode Zone to production

requirements.text: Deploy the current GoCode Zone application to production on the Internet Computer mainnet
acceptanceCriteria: Application is deployed and accessible via a production URL on the Internet Computer
All existing features (Home, About, Course, Join Discord, VIP, Privacy Policy, Contact pages) are functional in production
Contact form submissions persist to the backend canister
Discord invite links work correctly in production
Navigation and routing function properly across all pages

constraints: Do not modify any existing functionality during deployment
Preserve all current Discord invite links (https://discord.gg/y5EBSaf8r2)
nonGoals: Modifying the visual design or styling
Updating any configuration or settings beyond what's needed for deployment
